Geesthacht: New garden signs to encourage replanting.
Franko Stein (FD Environment, left) and Friedhelm Ringe (Nabu) are putting up the plant signs in the flower beds of the pedestrian zone.

"Geesthacht is blossoming" is the name of an initiative by Nabu in cooperation with the municipal administration.
With the participation of many volunteers from clubs, schools, kindergartens, companies, and institutions, thousands of flower bulbs and plants have been planted in the ground since 2015.

"In favorable weather conditions, bees start flying out in January to search for food," says Friedhelm Ringe from the Geesthachter Nabu.

So that the endeavor doesn't remain just an action of nature conservationists and the Environmental Department of the city, but spreads into private gardens as well, explanatory signs about the plants are repeatedly put up.
About 50 signs so far.
Passersby should be able to inform themselves in this way about what is currently blooming so beautifully here.
The hope is that hobby gardeners will replant at home selectively.
The season already started for the wild hazel in the first week of January.
Of more recent date are shrubs like winter fragrance honeysuckle and winter snowball in the flowerbeds of the pedestrian zone.

They have been stuck in the earth of the pots on Bergedorer Street for a year now, just showing their first delicate leafless flowers in white and pink, and have recently been adorned with more signs.
"The winter-scented honeysuckle is a very wide-spreading shrub and can grow between two meters high and three meters wide," it says there, among other information about the suitable location.
The season already started for the wild hazel in the first week of January.
Friedhelm

Translation:
Wikipedia:
Tap dance was developed in the 19th century in the USA and is a form of dance where the dancers create rhythmic patterns with their feet.
Typically, tap dance is performed wearing special shoes called tap shoes.
The dance has its origins in African and Irish traditions and was later influenced by other cultures as well.
Today, tap dance is known and popular worldwide.
Developed in the United States in the century and is now known worldwide.

With two metal plates attached to the front and back of the shoes, which are more durable than the initially used wooden soles, rhythmic sounds are produced while dancing that match the visual impression and music.
The dancer thus also becomes a percussion musician.
The English expression for this is onomatopoeic "Tap dance" and the French "Claquettes".
The Spanish flamenco could have influenced tap dancing.
The shoe tips are nailed so they produce a loud audible sound while dancing.

Deutsche Bank CEO Christian Sewing considers further interest rate hikes in the fight against high inflation to be "absolutely" necessary.
The inflationary risks remain significant.
"The costs for energy can easily rise again, and the opening of China can temporarily give prices a boost," Sewing said to "Welt am Sonntag".

The European Central Bank (ECB) raised interest rates in the euro area for the fifth consecutive time at the beginning of February and indicated another increase by 0. 5 percentage points for the meeting on March 16th.
The interest rate in the euro area is now at 3. 0 percent.
The deposit rate that commercial banks receive when they park money at the ECB is 2.
5 percent.
Higher interest rates increase the cost of loans.
This can slow down demand and counteract high inflation rates.
Higher interest rates can lead to the postponement of investments and thus weaken economic growth.
Rising interest rates are also a burden for highly indebted eurozone countries such as Italy.
"The consequences of a persistently high inflation are significantly more serious than the higher financing costs for some countries," said Sewing.
"Of course, we have to keep an eye on that, but a high level of debt must not prevent the ECB from acting consistently.
The ECB aims for price stability in the euro area in the medium term at an inflation rate of two percent.
This target has been far away for months.
In January, the upward pressure on prices weakened again, but consumer prices in the currency area of now 20 countries were still 8.
5 percent higher than in the same month of the previous year.
Higher inflation rates reduce the purchasing power of consumers, because they can then afford less for one euro.
Significantly increased energy prices, which drive inflation significantly, are also a burden for companies.
"If inflation remains high, private consumption will eventually collapse," warned Sewing, who is also the President of the Association of German Banks (BdB).
I currently see the biggest danger for the German economy in that.
"But I am optimistic that we can avoid this scenario.

Union warns against breakup of the Bayer Group.
The Chemistry Union IG BCE warns of a dismantling of the company after an announced change in leadership at Bayer.

"From the employees' point of view, Bayer is well positioned with its three main pillars for the challenges of the future," said Francesco Grioli, board member of the trade union and member of Bayer's supervisory board, to the "Rheinische Post" (Saturday edition).
"This refers to the pharmaceutical business with prescription drugs, the consumer health sector with over-the-counter medications, and the agricultural business. "
The controversial CEO Werner Baumann will step down this summer.

Baumann has been under criticism for a long time.
The manager is burdened by the 2018 completed acquisition of the US seed manufacturer Monsanto for 63 billion dollars.
With the purchase, the people of Leverkusen had brought expensive legal disputes regarding alleged cancer risks of the weedkiller glyphosate into their house.
The Bayer stock has been in a downward trend for years.
In 2019, the shareholders denied the CEO discharge at the general meeting.
It had been known for some time that Baumann does not intend to extend his contract, which was supposed to run until 2024.
Pressure had been put on by long-term oriented strategic investors.
Recently, several activist Anglo-Saxon investors like Bluebell Capital also joined the mix.
According to a media report, Bluebell is pushing for a breakup of the corporation.
The very small fund with an unknown level of participation in Bayer is known for its aggressive approach.
A spin-off "of the Consumer Health division would be a possible way to increase the company's value," said Markus Manns, fund manager at Union Investment, to the "Rheinische Post".
He, on the other hand, does not consider a spin-off of the much larger agricultural division Crop Science to be feasible.
Hundreds of thousands want to demonstrate against pension reform.
Paris
On Saturday, the French plan to take to the streets once again to protest against the proposed pension reform.
The unions are opposing the government's project with a strong protest on the streets.
Hundreds of thousands want to demonstrate against the pension reform again on Saturday.
In France, hundreds of thousands of people are expected to demonstrate nationwide on Saturday against President Emmanuel Macron's planned pension reform.
For the fourth time, the unions are mobilizing against the plans of the centrist government to raise the retirement age from 62 to 64 years.
Twice already, over a million people took to the streets and there were nationwide strikes.
Last Tuesday, 750,000 participants were counted at the protests.
A turbulent debate in parliament has been ongoing for a week over the controversial reform.
Many people in France already work beyond the age of 62 if they have not paid enough contributions for a pension without deductions.
In many demanding occupations, the opponents of the reform believe that people could hardly work longer.
In addition, the employees wanted to be able to enjoy their well-deserved retirement and not wear out their health completely in the job.
Macron: Impending deficit in pension fund
Macron justifies the reform with an impending deficit in the pension fund.
Because the population is getting older, the employees should bear the burden of an increasing number of retirees through their contributions.
In order to maintain the level of pension, the population must work a bit more.
The critics doubt the government's calculations and demand that the state must find alternative sources of funding in order to maintain the pension system in balance.
But the government doesn't just want to tinker with retirement age.
The already decided increase in the necessary payment period for a full pension is to be accelerated.
In addition, individual pension systems with privileges for certain professional groups are to be abolished.
The minimum pension is set to increase to about 1200 euros.
The pension reform is considered one of President Macron's most important projects.
During the Corona pandemic, a first attempt to implement the reform was abandoned, there were already massive protests and strikes at that time.
Since Macron's party no longer has an absolute majority in parliament, it hopes to push through the reform with the help of the conservative Républicains, who have announced their support.
And even greater than the fear of a close vote, the concern about paralyzing strikes is likely to be at Macron's forefront at the moment.

Before the renewed demonstrations on Saturday, the president said that he could rely on the organizers' sense of responsibility so that they would proceed calmly and not lead to a blockade of the country.
A powerful high-pressure system is located over Central Europe and determines the weather in Germany.
Does this mean that we can expect a lot of sunshine everywhere?
Offenbach
Offenbach
In Germany, calm high pressure weather is expected at least until the middle of the week.
This high pressure system will shift slightly eastward over the course of the next week.
However, it still determines the weather in Germany.
However, quiet high-pressure weather in winter does not necessarily mean sunny weather, says Übel.
Such a high pressure system can even be quite mean and give people days of dreary foggy gray in the lowlands, while there is pure sunshine in the higher elevations of the Mittelgebirge.
Sunday starts foggy and cloudy in most regions.
According to the DWD, it can still rain a little from the Ore Mountains and the Thuringian Forest to Lower Bavaria.
Especially along the edge of the Alps, but also in the southwest and parts of the west, the cloud cover will clear up during the day and the sun will appear more frequently.
In the rest of the country, it remains mostly cloudy or covered with high fog.
The temperatures reach 4 to 9 degrees, around 10 degrees near the Rhine.
"On Monday, the gradually strengthening sun will nibble away at the high fog again and can dissolve it more and more during the day," says the meteorologist.

At the edge of the Alps, in the high-altitude regions of the low mountain ranges, and in parts of North Rhine-Westphalia, full-day sunshine is expected, elsewhere it will have to fight its way through the high fog bank.
The maximum temperatures range from 5 to 9 degrees, around 11 degrees in the Lower Rhine region, while only around 3 degrees are expected in the persistent grayness in the southeast.
A weak wind is blowing from various directions.
On Tuesday, there may be persistent fog or overcast in some low-lying areas.
Otherwise, the weather appears clear after the fog clears.
According to forecasts, the sun is expected to shine all day in high-altitude areas, large parts of North Rhine-Westphalia, and along the Alpine foothills.
The temperatures climb to 5 to 11 degrees depending on the sunshine.

1. General
This game illustrates the combat action from the perspective of a tank driver.
The battles are fought in a wide valley, completely surrounded by mountains and volcanoes.
In the valley plain there are rock pyramids and rock blocks that provide temporary protection to the player, as they cannot be destroyed by enemy shots.
The opponent is represented by slow-moving tracked vehicles and fast super tanks, as well as agile rockets that become increasingly difficult to hit during the extended gameplay.
Additionally, UFOs appear at periodic intervals.
These cannot attack the player tank.
On the other hand, the player can achieve a high score through a UFO hit.
The device BATTLEZONE has five (5) different operating modes.
These are the attraction sequence, the game introduction sequence, the game sequence, the initial input for high scores, and the self-test sequence.
The latter mode represents a special sequence for checking the controls and the computer function.
4. Game process
The game process is triggered when the START button is pressed.
The LED switch remains illuminated and the game sounds become audible.
When the last player tank is eliminated by the enemy attacker, a game is ended.
The game starts with slowly moving tanks that become visible on the screen.
The player can determine the position of the respective enemy tanks or rockets by paying attention to the displayed text in the upper left corner of his cockpit.
A clue could read, for example:
OPPONENTS FROM THE RIGHT.
In addition, a point representing the enemy position is visible on the extensive radar screen accompanied by a sonar BLIP sound.
The upper, conical surface on the radar screen represents the player's field of view on the underlying screen.
If the opponent is in this area, he can be aimed well on the screen.
Furthermore, the opponent in the firing range is simultaneously displayed in the upper left notification display.
Temporary UFOs become visible on the screen, flying over the battlefield.
These are harmless projectiles that observe the combat situation and cannot eliminate the opponent or the player's tank.
The flight position of the UFOs cannot be detected by radar.
The UFOs are intended to round off the combat situation and distract the player, as they usually appear simultaneously with enemy tanks or rockets.
UFO's can be eliminated by both the player tank and the enemy tank.
A shot by the player earns them 5,000 points.
When an opponent is hit, the following points are obtained:
For a slow-moving tank 1,000 points, for a rocket 2,000 points, and for a super-tank 3,000 points.
A super tank drives and turns twice as fast as the player tank or a slowly moving enemy tank.
Several options give the player the opportunity to use 2, 3, 4 or even 5 tanks for gameplay.
Furthermore, after reaching predetermined scores, a bonus tank can be unlocked and the appearance of the rocket can be varied for a more challenging gameplay.
Details and the exact switching positions of the game sequence selector switch for this adjustment option can be found in the illustration.
5. Initial input for highest scores
If a player exceeds the minimum score in the highest scores table, he or she can enter three (3) personal initials into the table after the game ends.
The instruction for this is self-explanatory and can be displayed in four languages.
Note that triggering a self-test, pressing the RESET button on the Battlezone Analog Vector-Generator PCB, or interrupting the power supply will erase the high score table.
When deleting (RESET), the ten (10) highest scores will be saved with their initials and rewritten on the screen to challenge other players.
Every score that is over 100,000 is additionally marked with a tank symbol, followed by the player's initials.
If a player does not enter their initials within 60 seconds, the computer will automatically write dashes.
After this, the device switches back to the attraction game sequence.
STRUCTURE ARRANGEMENT
1. New parts
The device BATTLEZONE has five (5) new components.
If you already have experience with video devices from ATARI, you should take note of these important differences.
The new parts are: A.
The control lever.
This is a reconstruction of the ATARI gear lever.
It was reinforced with several additional ribs in the inner and outer housing parts, making this assembly more stable and ensuring proper functioning of the switch contacts.
Another modification is the rubber centering bellows, which, like a centering spring, repeatedly brings the control lever back to the neutral position.
The micro switches are now secured with self-locking nuts for easier replacement.
B. Two PC boards.
ATARI's X/Y game circuit has been expanded onto two (2) interconnected boards.
With the help of this switching technology, more lines are produced on the screen at a higher speed, resulting in a smooth and calm image.
C. The power supply.
Battlezone is equipped with a newly designed power supply.
It has a larger, more powerful transformer to support the increased power supply provided by the circuit expansion.
D.
The device housing.
Due to the new design, it was now possible to install a new cash register with a larger coin capacity.
Furthermore, there is a console in the device that is intended as a platform for smaller players to make playing easier.
At the same time, this console ensures maximum device stability at the installation site.
These new components, as well as all other main assemblies of this device, are shown in Figure 1.
If one of these new parts is mentioned in the manual, you will find this symbol.
2. Device inspection
After removing the packaging, this new entertainment device is ready to play.
Nevertheless, you should carry out a certain review to round off the quality control.
To ensure that the device has been delivered to you in proper condition, the following checks should be carried out:
NOTE:
Do not connect device to the 220 V power supply yet.
A. Inspect the exterior of the housing for any damage.
Open the maintenance panel of the device and check the components inside the device as follows:
Check all cable harness connectors for the correct and firm connection.
Potential open or Connect loose plugs together.
NOTE: Never force plug connections.
The plugs are equipped with a guiding system, so that a correct connection is established.
A plug connection turned 180 degrees destroys the PCB.
Check the plug connections to the game PC board for correct and secure seating.
Please note the manufacturing number of the device on the type plate on the back of the device.
Check whether the punched production number matches those of the Battlezone Analog Vector-Generator PC board, auxiliary PC board, Control/Audio II PC board, and TV monitor.
An illustration of the location of the production number can be found on the back cover of this manual.
This number should always be provided when calling your specialist dealer for further service information.
Check all other main components such as the power supply, control console, and TV monitor for proper assembly.
Finally, the device must be supplied with mains voltage and turned on.
With a glance through the player's viewing window, it should be checked whether the radar screen is also located in the bright, orange-highlighted opening of the casing.
If the opening is not precisely centered, the cover attached to the housing with adhesive tape must be released and realigned.
Before connecting the device to the mains supply, it must be ensured that the voltage selector plug on the power supply unit 1 (see Fig. 3) corresponds to the local mains voltage.

Below you will find a number of tips that can help you solve most problems related to current DirectX games.
Checking the system configuration
Please take the time to check if your system meets the requirements listed on the package.
With the help of the DirectX diagnostic tool, you can get an overview of your system if you are not sure whether your PC meets the requirements.
Please proceed as follows to access the DirectX diagnostic program:
Now the user interface of the DirectX diagnostic program is displayed.
You can, among other things, check whether graphics and sound are working correctly by clicking on the corresponding buttons to test DirectDraw, Direct3D, and DirectSound.
Note: If you do not have advanced computer knowledge, we would advise against changing any of the options in the DirectX diagnostic program.
Before starting the game.
It is possible that other programs may take up the system resources that the game needs to run smoothly.
Not all of these programs make it obvious that they are active, and many are automatically started when the system boots up.
In some cases, they can be the cause of your program hanging or crashing.
Therefore, we recommend that you close such background applications before starting the game.
Look for the program's icon in the Windows taskbar.
Clean up the system
Before you install software, it must be ensured that your hard drive is functioning optimally.
The tools you need for this are included with Windows: use ScanDisk, defragmentation, and disk cleanup to ensure everything runs smoothly.
Then the chances are high that current games will run largely problem-free on your PC.
Consult the Windows help files to learn about the tools ScanDisk or error checking, defragmentation, and disk cleanup.
The use of Windows Help
You will then receive instructions that explain how to use these tools.
The game crashes or hangs?
For games that use the latest version of DirectX, you should make sure that you have the latest drivers for your graphics card.
This way, you can often prevent a game from crashing or freezing.

INTRODUCTORY WORDS ABOUT FAHRENHEIT

The desire to develop video games was sparked in me by the emergence of 3D real-time technology, which suddenly opened up a lot of new possibilities and appeared to me as a new means of expression through which one could push the world to its limits.
She represented an opportunity for me to explore new horizons.
I felt like a cinematic pioneer at the beginning of the 20th century.
Century before:
To be completely honest, the next ten years couldn't satisfy my hunger.
Meanwhile, the technology continued to make rapid progress.
Fahrenheit represents my contribution to making video games a true means of conveying sensations.
Although this could naturally have happened in a completely different form, Fahrenheit's greatest merit is the fact that real questions are raised and concrete answers are offered here.

Fahrenheit is proof that you can create an interactive gaming experience that is not only based on fighting disgusting monsters in dark corridors and shooting crates to get ammunition, but also has much more demanding and profound content.
It is proof that you can both tell a story and offer gameplay content without having to sacrifice the narrative or interactive elements.
I hope that both hardcore gamers and casual players will have fun with this new gaming experience.
If you are rather skeptical about playing video games, I hope that Fahrenheit will contribute to changing your attitude in this regard.
May other developers also feel the desire to embark on this new creative path and enrich it with their own inspirations, talent, and ambition.
The interactivity is still in its infancy and offers the opportunity to discover everything for the first time.

Over the past two years, Fahrenheit has filled a large part of our lives and represented an unforgettable interpersonal and intellectual adventure for the entire Quantic Dream team, in which we were repeatedly forced to question many previously considered inviolable principles.
David Cage

CMOS MEMORY (Memory)
FAILURE
All values stored in the RAM will be reset to factory default settings.
This condition probably indicates a battery failure or error.
TROUBLESHOOTING and SETTINGS
Start of the test method.
Press the "Sub-Test" switch or the "Self-Test" button (SW 1 near the LED display).
All LEDs should light up and the hardware test can begin.
The tests and settings can be entered into the respective program display, pressing the "Test" button will show the next program each time.
If a durability test of the video board is desired, the self-test button must be pressed twice to initiate the video test in auto-test mode.
In this program, the device will continuously perform the hardware test until it is shut down.
With the unplugged plug J 19, the memory is protected and the CMOS RAM test video cannot be performed.
Hardware tests:
These tests are conducted as follows: O = off / I = on / X = test results.
The ROM checksum calculates the checksum of every video ROM and compares it with the stored checksum for this ROM.
If there is a difference, the device stops and the value of the ROM with the wrong checksum appears on the LEDs.
If the checksum of ROM is faulty, U 10 is displayed first.
If this test fails, the next ROM displayed on the LED display must be replaced.
The E-PROM memory in a given game can be introduced as a bank (series) of either 2716 or 2732 E-PROMs.
The E-PROM type for each series is selected by the decoder connector (26-00002-016 for 2716 or 26-00002-032 for 2732).
Communications RAM from the video board

The Communications RAM test determines the functional reliability of the memory shared by two processors by storing predetermined series of numbers in RAM and then checking if the storage was correct.
LED value: 00 0010
If the Gerdt with the above.
Display holds, an error was detected.
If the communications RAMs fail during the video board test, the error may have been caused by a defective wiring (RAM) or errors in the data board.
To locate the error, remove the data board from P 6 and repeat the test.
A failure means: errors in the U 3, U 4 or related circuits.
Video Board CMOS RAM
After values have been written to another part of the memory, the CMOS RAM is checked in the same way as the Communications RAM.
If the test is passed, all memory locations will be set to their previous value.
LED value: 00 0011
If the device with the above-mentioned display holds, there is an error.
Check in this case U 85 and U 86 and the associated circuits
The decoding.
Test video board color RAM by storing predetermined number sequences in the color RAM.
These numbers will be checked for accuracy when read back.
LED value: 00 0100
When this value is displayed, there is an error.
Check U 56, U 57, associated multiplexers and decoders.
Video board (display RAM).
The display RAM is checked by writing a pattern on each page.
The results of these registrations are compared with the original pattern.
Any discrepancy causes the program to stop and the LEDs indicate the faulty RAM.
If a display RAM fails, diagnose the problem and replace the RAM.
If this error diagnosis does not indicate a RAM failure (00 0101 on LEDs), it will display that the next test is starting (Data Hardware).
The connection to the data processor must be available and it must be functioning.
